## modelHotReplacement() function

model热更新

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function modelHotReplacement(moduleName: string, ModelClass: CommonModelClass): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  moduleName | string | Model所属模块名称 |
|  ModelClass | [CommonModelClass](./vue-taro.commonmodelclass.md) | 新的Model |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

修改了Model时热更新，通常由脚手架自动调用
